channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Japan’s Leader Gets Off to Rocky Start With China
item.description: Facing reprisals from Beijing for a remark over Taiwan, Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi must walk a fine line to prevent escalating the dispute without ...

item.title: Brain scientists are seeking weight-loss drugs without the nausea
item.description: Weight-loss drugs like Wegovy and Zepbound often cause nausea and other side effects. Brain scientists are looking for ways to solve this problem.

item.title: What former ally did Trump call a 'ranting Lunatic' this week? Find out in the quiz
item.description: This week, the quiz examines truth, drugs and scandal!

item.title: Mexico Wins Miss Universe Pageant Marred by Scandal
item.description: Fátima Bosch was crowned in Thailand on Friday. The competition got off to a rocky start this month when she briefly walked out after being scolded by...

item.title: Republicans’ Redistricting Push Is at Risk of Backfiring
item.description: A series of setbacks for the G.O.P. leaves an unlikely opening for Democrats to narrowly win this year’s redistricting wars.

item.title: Rare earths: Federal backing and tech advances aim to help the U.S. catch up to China
item.description: Rare earths aren't all that rare. The real choke point is in processing and refining them, where China enjoys market dominance.

item.title: Anxiety Over A.I. Spending Returns to Global Markets
item.description: A sharp reversal in Asian and European stocks, after a rally fueled by Nvidia’s strong earnings, underscores how fears of an A.I. bubble are driving b...

item.title: Russian hacking suspect wanted by the FBI arrested on Thai resort island
item.description: Thai Police have arrested a suspected Russian hacker who is wanted by the FBI for alleged cyberattacks on U.S. and European government agencies.

item.title: Mamdani at the White House, and the Coast Guard’s New Policy on Swastikas and Nooses

item.title: Sanna Marin Led Finland Through Covid and Russian Threats. But She’s Famous for a Shimmy.

item.title: Fine Chocolate in Brazil, Home of the Cacao Bean
item.description: A new generation of craft chocolatiers in Brazil is making bars with “identity.” They’re helping to sustain the forest, too.

item.title: After Syria’s 14-Year Civil War, a Search for Victims Leads to Mass Graves
